article: extremely concerned by reports of 20 dead and several arrested for protesting against the governmentun special rapporteur on the situation of human rights in the islamic republic of #irani share the worries of civil society groups at the possibility of use of torture and further violence on those arrestedcalling out of the revolutionary guards to deal with the protesters strictly and threats of harsh punishment to those who took part in the protests is unacceptabledisturbed by the way the authorities have responded to the proteststhe iranian government is called upon to use restraint and to make public the names of all those arrestedthe iranian government is called upon to unblock internet on mobile and other means of communications on social media all censorship should be lifted as it seriously offends freedom of expressionthe government of the islamic republic of iran could take this opportunity to address the legitimate issues raised by the protesters of denial of political , social and economic rights of the people .
